mapper.insert: insert into LAND_THEMATIC_PICTURE (ID, SECTION_ID, SECTION_NAME, MONITOR_TIME, PIC_NAME, PIC_LEVEL, PIC_URL, UPLOADER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{picName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uploader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.update: update LAND_THEMATIC_PICTURE set SECTION_ID = #{sectionId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SECTION_NAME = #{sectionName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MONITOR_TIME = #{monitorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, PIC_NAME = #{picName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIC_LEVEL = #{picLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PIC_URL = #{picUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPLOADER = #{uploader,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARKS = #{remarks,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID, SECTION_ID, SECTION_NAME, MONITOR_TIME, PIC_NAME, PIC_LEVEL, PIC_URL, UPLOADER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from LAND_THEMATIC_PICTURE where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select ID, SECTION_ID, SECTION_NAME, MONITOR_TIME, PIC_NAME, PIC_LEVEL, PIC_URL, UPLOADER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, REMARKS from LAND_THEMATIC_PICTURE
